direction.raw_text: On a hill above the city is an old CATHEDRAL. The night is spooky, with harsh shadows playing across the cobblestones and medieval walls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: makes his way down an alley. There is a DOOR at the end of the alley. MUSIC can be faintly heard from inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: High above the street an INTRUDER DRESSED ALL IN BLACK spies from the roof. He's watching with NIGHT VISION GOGGLES. He pulls out a CROSSBOW and FIRES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: flies, trailing CABLE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! It sticks into the alley wall below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As he passes by the ominous Cathedral, the Hacker spins, sure he's heard something. But there's nothing there. He continues on. Then the Intruder comes sliding down the ZIP-LINE from above.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! He kicks the Hacker into the wall, knocking him out. The Intruder pulls off his mask, revealing the chiseled features of a dashing BRITISH SECRET AGENT. His name is STERLING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sterling searches the Hacker and pulls a SMALL BLACK CASE from his coat. Inside the case is a DATA CHIP. Sterling tucks it away. Sterling unzips his black jumpsuit, revealing a crisp TUXEDO underneath. He pulls out CAR KEYS. In a quick insert we see the "ASTON-MARTIN" LOGO. As he strolls back out the alley, he HEARS something and flattens against the wall.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I hate to drop in unexpectedly.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: screeches to a stop, blocking his exit. The SUV's HEADLIGHTS illuminate the slumped Hacker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: get out to investigate, pulling out weapons. Cornered, Sterling heads deeper into the alley, staying in the shadows. He gets to that DOOR the Hacker was heading towards. As he PICKS THE LOCK Sterling can hear MUSIC from inside. He smooths his hair and prepares to "blend in" with the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sterling comes through the door and his face falls. He's stepped into a loud METAL CONCERT. We see a GO-GO DANCER in LATEX. Onstage is RAMMSTEIN, a bizarre German industrial-metal band. The tattooed YOUNG CROWD slam dances and swings glo-stix over their heads. Some wear rubber BRAIN SKULLCAPS outfitted with fiber optic lights. It's a sea of SPIKED HAIR and BONDAGE OUTFITS. Sterling squares his jaw and starts pushing through the crowd. With his tuxedo he sticks out like a penguin in a chicken coop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stands a wild haired young GANGSTER with PIERCED BROWS. With him is a STREET-TOUGH GIRL with multi-colored hair. They look like a post-Apocalyptic Bonnie & Clyde. They are YORGI and PETRA. Yorgi checks his watch. His delivery is late. Then his CELL PHONE rings. He's getting the news from outside. He looks down, spots Sterling amidst the moshing crowd. With that look, that tux, there's no mistaking what he is. They make EYE CONTACT and Sterling gives a little nod. Yorgi calmly issues orders into his phone. Immediately VIKTOR starts moving in Sterling's direction. Viktor is huge, with a MOHAWK and a six-inch GOATEE. Sterling sees him advancing and makes for the exit, pushing through the freaky crowd.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: ON THE BALCONY ABOVE THE CROWD

direction.raw_text: Sterling's ASTON-MARTIN VANTAGE screeches away from the curb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sterling is at the wheel of his spy car. He plugs the DATA CHIP into the dash and punches buttons. A computer screen says "DATA DOWNLOADING". He sees a BLACKED-OUT SUV racing up behind him. He accelerates and hits a SWITCH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: slides up over the rear window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The SUV is right behind him. Viktor rolls down the passenger window, readies his PISTOL. The rear bumper of the spy car opens. SMOKE BOMBS drop out. They explode in MASSIVE CLOUDS, obscuring the narrow, street. Sterling skids around a corner. The blinded bad guys drive straight into a STOREFRONT. Glass and merchandise flies as the SUV gets stuck. The Aston-Martin rounds another corner and slides to a stop. Blocking the road ahead are two more SUV's.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: slides to a stop in front of them. The rider is ANDERS, a leather clad biker who looks half Viking. Anders pulls out a SILENCED SUB-MACHINE GUN and starts BLASTING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: into the Aston-Martin, cracking the bullet-proof glass, shattering headlights, and BLOWING OUT THE FRONT TIRES! Sterling jams it into reverse and backs around the corner on the RIMS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sterling notices an ERROR MESSAGE now flashing on his computer screen: "TRANSMISSION ERROR: - DATA PARTIALLY SENT". Sterling looks around desperately. Somehow he's got to get this data out of here. Straight ahead is the RIVER. Chugging up the river: a PARTY BARGE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: in formal attire dance to an orchestra. A SWIMMING POOL is in the middle of the deck for a perfect water landing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He hits a BUTTON.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Time for a slow boat to China.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The rear license plate folds down, revealing a ROCKET ENGINE. Flames spew as he jams down the accelerator. Sterling is pushed back into his seat by the G-forces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: fly from the rims as he skips across the pavement at ever increasing speed. Anders FIRES with his gun, but Sterling is getting away! But then KIRILL steps around the corner. He's academic looking, a CHAIN SMOKING intellectual with COKE-BOTTLE GLASSES. He's also a highly proficient and cold-blooded SNIPER. Kirill puts his lit cigarette behind his ear and unslings a SURFACE-TO-AIR MISSILE LAUNCHER from his shoulder. The Aston-Martin reaches the riverbank and goes AIRBORNE. It ROCKETS through the air towards the party barge. We see the car REFLECTED in Kirill's glasses as he AIMS. On a little SCREEN we see the missile launcher HOME IN on the HEAT SOURCE of the jet engine. The missile locks-in and FIRES...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - we see a GREEN CAR with all its hot spots GLOWING RED. Camera ROARS towards the flying car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sterling sees the missile streaking at him.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Oh bloody hell!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ! The Aston-Martin EXPLODES in mid-air. Partygoers shriek as the AXLE and FLAMING RIMS rain down on the deck. Kirill takes the cigarette from his ear, PUFFS IT. Finally, Sterling's flaming BOW TIE flutters down and lands on a LEAPING SALMON ICE-SCULPTURE above a tantalizing SEAFOOD BUFFET.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: over the city. We make a sudden left turn and SPEED OUT OF TOWN. We shoot over to the BLUE RIDGE MOUNTAINS of VIRGINIA. In the middle of NOWHERE we dive towards a COMPLEX OF BLACK BUILDINGS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Inside it's modern, cold and high tech. An elevator COUNTS DOWN to a deep basement level. The doors open and a TALL MAN man with a PROSTHETIC LEG strides down the empty hall. AGENT GIBBONS is African- American, a battle-scarred WARRIOR. Even with a limp he looks sturdy, confident, deadly. At the end of the hall is a METAL DOOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gibbons walks into the INFORMATION ROOM of the NATIONAL SECURITY AGENCY (NSA). There are WORLD MAPS, SATELLITE IMAGES on COMPUTER SCREENS, TECHIES monitoring everything. If a nuclear war broke out, you could run the country from down here. Gibbons takes an elevator up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The office is expensive yet devoid of personality, reflecting the shadowy nature of it's owner. One wall is GLASS, looking down on the information room. SAM TANNICK, grizzled NSA chief, looks down at the activity below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gibbons enters, stands by the desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sam remains in shadow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gibbons snaps on the giant FLATSCREEN on Sam's desk. He starts cycling through PHOTO AFTER PHOTO of TOUGH LOOKING MEN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gibbons clicks off the screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sam sighs, stares out at the information room.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Come.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Evening, Sam.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What do you have?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Not a whole helluva lot. His final transmission was mangled. About something or someone called "Ahab". Whatever it is, it cost him his life.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He was the best there was. That makes three agents lost.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They're ruthless and they have a lot of firepower. It's only a matter of time before they figure out how to deploy Silent Night. Then we're gonna have a catastrophe on our hands.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Silent Night in the hands of a bunch of impertinent cowboys
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're gonna have to step in, Sam. Those CIA boys couldn't find a clown in a field of cactus. Let me take care of it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: How will you fix it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'll go in with a team. But first I'm going to need some intel. I'll have to put someone inside, someone new, someone they won't see coming. One of their own.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: So you'll dredge the bottom again. You've done that before. The results were... uneven.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You wanna find out about rats, ask a rat. I've had my people put together a talent pool. I downloaded it to your desktop.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The usual prospects. Convicts, contract killers, murde...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The scum of the Earth.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But programmable. And expendable.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I've seen enough. Turn it off.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They're degenerates. There's not a man in there that would give a damn if the Chinese took over.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's exactly why we need them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Get these "scum", Mr. Gibbons, bring them in. Test them. Train them. Find your man.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The huge ARCO TOWER rises up towards a moonlit sky. We see ACCOMPLICE #1 (TRAVIS PASTRANA) sneak up and take position behind a FOUNTAIN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #2 (CAREY HART) sneaks across a roof and takes position overlooking the fountain position of #1.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #3 (DAVE MIRRA) takes up position in the second story window of a FLOPHOUSE HOTEL down the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: skates up to the front of the skyscraper with a PACKAGE. He gets the attention of the SECURITY GUARD inside. The Security Guard unlocks the door and lets him in. Just then a VAN pulls up and ACCOMPLICES #4 (SHAUN PALMER) and #5 (MAT HOFFMAN) hop out. They open up the back and a BICYCLE is rolled out of the back by a MAN IN A HOODED JACKET. Jacket Man rolls the bike to the skyscraper and enters the lobby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Security Guard is checking his computer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: K The Guard glances up as Jacket Man gets into an ELEVATOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Security Guard rushes to intercept him. The Messenger kicks his skateboard out, TRIPPING UP the Security Guard. The Messenger hauls ass out the door. The Security Guard pulls out his WALKIE-TALKIE.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Crump... I'm sorry, no one by that name.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey! You can't go up there!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We've got an intruder in the express elevator!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The button for "91 - ROOF ACCESS" is lit up. Jacket Man waits patiently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This fancy office is empty for the night. The STAIRWELL DOOR opens and a PLATOON of SECURITY GUARDS rushes in. They take Up position in front of the elevator doors armed with BILLY CLUBS and TASERS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The elevator arrives and the door swings open. But there's NOBODY INSIDE. One Guard steps forward and suddenly a bicycle SWINGS DOWN from the ceiling, TAGGING HIM IN THE FACE. He falls back, TASERING another Guard. Jacket Man drops down onto his bike and pedals through the chaos before the Guards know what hit them. There's a CURVY PIECE OF ART in the room, some kind of modern art statue. Jacket Man rides up the artwork like a ramp and does a TABLETOP AERIAL over a DIVIDER. He hits the ground pedalling, the Guards hot after him. Jacket Man enters a HUGE OPEN ROOM with a FIELD OF CUBICLES in the middle. He bunny hops onto a desk and SLIDES TO A STOP. He tosses back his hood and we get a good look at him for the first time. He is XANDER CAGE. He's got a shaved head, bizarre TATTOOS all over his body and multiple PIERCINGS. He's lean and heavily cut, even dangerous looking. The Guards charge at him and he HOPS up onto the top of the CUBICLE WALL. This thing is maybe FOUR INCHES WIDE and FIVE FEET TALL. He pedals across the top of the cubicle wall, the Guards scrambling after him. Xander bunny hops over one guy's head onto the next set of cubicles and pedals hard. The Guards fall all over themselves trying to catch him. At the other end Xander catches air and lands on a CONFERENCE TABLE. He does a WHEELIE across it's length with Guards closing in. Xander springs up and does a TAIL WHIP, knocking them back with his rear wheel. He lands and pedals to the stairwell untouched.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander bursts out of the stairwell to the top of the TALLEST BUILDING IN DOWNTOWN LA. He climbs on a RAISED PLATFORM. From here he can drop down onto another level that is strewn with SATELLITE DISHES and MICROWAVE RELAYS. Guards rush onto the roof and try to corral him. Xander tears off his jacket, revealing a BACKPACK on his back and VIDEO CAMERA on his chest. He pulls out a ROAD FLARE and SPARKS IT. We see there are SOAKED RAGS tied to his SPOKES. He LIGHTS THEM with the flare. Then he TOSSES THE FLARE off the building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Accomplices see the flare drop. #'s 1, 2 & 3 pull CAMERAS OUT and start filming.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: OFF THE TOP OF THE BUILDING

direction.raw_text: Xander races around the roof like a trapped animal. He evades Security Guards, picking up speed. With Guards right behind, he drops off the TOP PLATFORM and lands on a massive SATELLITE DISH. Using the dish as a ramp, Xander LAUNCHES himself OFF THE TOP OF THE BUILDING. We're talking 90 some stories here. He spins through the air, his bike on fire. He's doing end over end backflips. One... Two... Three... Four... He's looping through space on his bike, a crazy man on a flaming bike against a backdrop of sleek skyscrapers and night lights. The stunt is covered by the various Accomplices and Xander's own chest camera, in SUPER 8 and DIGITAL VIDEO, from four different angles. Xander ditches the bike, kicking it away from him and plummets towards the ground. At the last moment he throws out a "bucket" and his PARACHUTE OPENS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The bicycle comes flying down and SMASHES into the pavement. It bounces a full TWO STORIES back up before coming to rest. Xander glides down and makes his landing. Accomplices #4 and #5 rush out to help him gather up his chute and jump in the van. SIRENS APPROACH as the van makes it's escape. As COP CARS screech up to the skyscraper, one of them RUNS OVER the smoking wreckage of the bike.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - HARDCORE MUSIC plays as we see a flowing TAPESTRY OF FLORID TATTOOS. SILHOUETTED against this backdrop we see the OUTLINES of NUDE WOMEN riding BMX BIKES in a HALF- PIPE, BLADING ever obstacles, SKY SURFING and doing street SKATE TRICKS. It's a collision of outlandish imagery that tells you one thing: This ain't your daddy's spy movie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander, now on a MOTORCYCLE, zips through traffic. He's smiling, leaning it way over on the turns. He's got another BACKPACK on his back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander drives his motorcycle into the garage of his building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: rises up, bringing Xander and his motorcycle into the loft. There are EXTREME SPORTS ACTION POSTERS on the walls, MOTORCYCLE PARTS and BARBELLS on the floor, and everywhere there's EXTREME SPORTS EQUIPMENT of every description.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a NEATLY FOLDED FLAG hanging in a slightly crooked FRAME on the wall. Xander straightens it as he goes by. He hears her in the sectioned off "bedroom" and heads back there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He comes into the bedroom to find SKY, his long-suffering girlfriend. She's a wannabe artist type. She's got SUITCASES and BOXES scattered around and she's PACKING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He opens up the backpack, revealing WADS OF CASH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She sorts through the money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He pulls off his shirt. Pierced through his nipple is a DIAMOND ENGAGEMENT RING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She heads towards the front door. Just then the door BLOWS IN.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Sky, you there? Start packin' cause we are out of here!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Did I promise you a fat vacation or what? Get ready to get down in paradise.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey, you don't need all this just to go on vacation. Unless this ain't for going on vacation...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm through, Xander.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I can see that. Why?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You run around with maniacs jumping motorcycles in the desert, you break 36 bones crashing wave runners and snowboarding off cliffs, all with no health insurance... It's insane, I can't take it anymore.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm having fun, what's the problem?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You have all this talent, and you waste it. You won't take a single endorsement deal. Meanwhile those other guys have their own video games! But no, you've got too much "integrity" for that.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't wanna go mersh, you know that. But hey, if this is about money...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I got an advance on the next bootleg. Let's get out of here, just you and me. We'll chill out in Bora Bora for a couple months.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: French Polynesia? This wouldn't last us a week in a cheap hotel. Do you know how expensive it is down there?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Alright, so I'll get more.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's not about the money, X! You never plan for anything. I can't live like that anymore, I need some stability.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well if you're bailing, I guess I'd better give you your surprise now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What...?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I was gonna wait till the islands, but...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're serious?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Of course I'm serious. I bought it, didn't I?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (shakes her head) This is so typical. I can't believe you. I've barely seen you for the last three weeks and now this? Are you out of your mind?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't know. I thought this is what you wanted. You want stability, here it is.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You can't just propose to me out of nowhere. You think that's going to solve our problems? I'm sorry, X. It was a kick for a while, but it's over. You're just not going anywhere.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're not exactly "going anywhere" yourself.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're wrong about that. I'm heading out that door right now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ! -- the windows SMASH IN too. Then the LIGHTS GO OUT as STORMTROOPERS in black body armor rush in, weapons drawn. It's a blur of FLASHLIGHTS, PISTOLS and JACK BOOTS. It's scary as hell. A professional take-down. They slam Xander against the wall. Just like that it's quiet again. Sky hyperventilates, a gun in her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Stormtrooper looks at Sky. She nods. The Stormtroopers take their guns off her. Sky grabs up here stuff. She looks back at Xander.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She heads out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Stormtrooper pulls out a DART GUN and SHOOTS Xander. He pulls a CHROME DART from his chest, examines it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander slides to the floor.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: She had nothing to do with the tower jump. She's nobody. I just met her last night. Tell them. (with meaning) I hardly know you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Keep the ring. It looks better on you anyways.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: God, I hate cops. What's the charges this time?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (groggy) You... pussies...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . PAN'S DINER - DAY A SIDEWAYS IMAGE: an out of focus COFFEE CREAMER. Xander wakes up with his head on the counter of a DINER. He shakes out the cobwebs.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What the hell?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: as a WAITRESS walks by. Xander blinks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander looks around, sees a TRUCKER chewing with his mouth open. A SALESMAN buried in his NEWSPAPER. Xander gets up. Where the hell is he? He takes a step towards the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Waitress pours him coffee. QUICK PUSH TO: her hands are shaking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander sits. When he swigs his coffee, he notices something written on his napkin in shaky ballpoint: "S.O.S." What the hell? He looks at the Trucker. The Trucker's staring at the waitress. QUICK PUSH TO: The Trucker has a BULGE underneath his vest... then PUSH TO: The Salesman's eyes darting about suspiciously, newspaper pulled up to his nose. Something is going down... He hears a SLOWED DOWN VOICE and glances back at the Trucker, who's now fixing him with a DEATH STARE. Xander snaps from his reverie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Trucker and the Salesman look at each other. Suddenly they jump up. The Trucker pulls a PISTOL from his vest, the Salesman brandishes the SHOTGUN he had behind the paper. The Waitress cringes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander stays strangely calm, his senses now fully focused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Waitress let's out a whimper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She goes to open the register and knocks a tray of glasses on the floor. Xander springs into action. He CHOPS down on the Trucker's arm and ELBOWS him in the face. Xander twists the gun out of his hand and kicks his legs out from under him. The Salesman pumps on his shotgun, but it seems to be jammed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Salesman fights with his gun but can't get it to work. Xander advances on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He unleashes with a series of rapid front kicks to the jaw. The Salesman goes crashing through the kitchen doors. Xander turns to the terrified Waitress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She stares at him, unable to speak. He raises the gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The front door bell JINGLES. A guy with an impeccably tailored suit and a cane hobbles in. It's Gibbons. There a problem, Mr. Cage?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He aims at the Waitress and FIRES! She's startled, but unhurt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander tosses the gun on the counter. Gibbons gives a sly smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gibbons sits in a booth. Xander sits across from him. In the background the Waitress helps the Trucker and Salesman up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a POP and Xander clutches his stomach. Gibbons tosses his DART GUN onto the table. Xander blinks at him. He pulls another CHROME DART from his gut and examines it.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Hey. Where am I? How did I get here?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't know, you wandered in ten minutes ago and put your head down. I told you we were closing.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Want some coffee?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Huh?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You alright?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (smiles) Fine, just fine. Come on and sit. I'll get you something to eat.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah, sure.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I said, you got a problem, boy?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Problem? No, no problem. You go right ahead.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: With what? I said, go right on ahead with what?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Whatever, dude.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Alright, nobody make a move! (to Xander) Shoulda walked away when you had the chance, dumb shit.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Forget him, Buck, let's just do it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Shut up! (in Xander's face) You keep still or I'm gonna make damn sure you stop breathing today. Got that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (shrugs) Alright, "Buck", whatever you say.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Keep your gotdam mouth shut and empty that register! Couldn't just let him leave, could ya! You know what I'm gonna do to ya for that? Huh? Do ya?!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Better shoot me quick.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Too late!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Alright, bitch, what's going on?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Talk! What's the game? Who are you people?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Who the hell are you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The name's Gibbons. You were saying?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What is this place?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Looks like a diner.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Diner, huh? Let me tell you what the problem is. I wake up drugged to find what? You've got a "salesman" over here reading a three week old newspaper. He's pulling a 211 with a "trucker", who happens to be packing a cop issue H&K 9mm. I get tipped that something is going down when she passes me a note. How's that for twisted logic? How did she know there was trouble unless they pulled the guns before I "walked" in? And if that's true, why'd they stop and wait until I woke up to gaffle the money? Then I notice how beefy they both are. Hell, even the waitress is cut. All three of them look like they went through the same training program. Ergo they ain't strangers and this isn't what it seems. That's how I knew yo-yo wouldn't get a round off even if I gave him all day. Why?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Cuz there's nothing but blanks in these guns. And no offense, but their performances were terrible.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Not bad. Not bad at all. Have a seat.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Most guys we ran through this either took off or helped them rob the place. I expected you to do the same.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That shows me already that you don't have a clue. What's it to you, anyway?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Whether you thought this was for real or not, you jumped in and helped the waitress on instinct. That tells me something about your character.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Good for you. Now why don't you stop wasting my time and tell me what you want. You didn't go through all this for my benefit.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's your lucky day. You just might get the chance to pay back our wonderful country for all the freedom you enjoy.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Fed, I shoulda known. Who else would have this kind of budget? Now you're gonna hit me with the sales pitch.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Alright, Cage, you've got me. This is one of those moments. "Many are called, few are chosen", that kind of thing. Your government needs you. Are you up for the challenge?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: ..If you're trolling around for narcs, man, have you got the wrong guy.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Why is that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Look at me, dude, do I look like a fan of law enforcement? Forget the tests, you shoulda just asked me. I woulda saved you a lot of trouble.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh I don't know, I think the tests work pretty well. Sometimes they give me answers you wouldn't admit to in a million years.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Are we done now? You've got nothing on me. So if you ain't booking me, I'm walking.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You've got this wrong. You're not under arrest, you've been abducted. And until I say different, you belong to me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Is that a fact?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sure as gravity. I've had a feeling about you from the start, Cage. It's nausea.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (smiles) You know what I hate? Any scumbag with a clean shirt and a bad haircut can get one of those tin stars and suddenly they think they're God.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (smiles) You know what I hate? It's always the assholes that pass the tests.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You bastards love to see me sleep.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ! He goes face down on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON - XANDER'S FACE He comes to, blinking in low RED LIGHT. He's shocked to find that he's...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander's on the floor of a military aircraft. TWO OTHER TOUGH GUYS are waking up next to him. One's a greaser named VIRG, the other is T.J., ex-Navy. Xander notices as they each pull out CHROME DARTS. They sit up, looking at each other. Xander chuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The three laugh, realizing they're all in the same boat. T.J. We must be the final "candidates". They quiet down as they notice for the first time, THEY ARE NOT ALONE. Sitting silently on benches facing them are SOLDIERS DRESSED IN BLACK. They wear BLACK MASKS over their faces. They are a nasty looking BLACK OPS TEAM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Black Ops Team, just stares. T.J. I've worked with guys like this before. Black Ops. Serious government spooks. Virg notices something STRAPPED TO HIS BODY. They all have them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then the red light switches to GREEN. One of the Soldiers opens the JUMP DOOR. The rest of the team advances on Xander, Virg and T.J.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They drag Virg to the door and THROW HIM OUT. T.J. goes next, kicking and fighting. Then they turn on Xander.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander jumps out on his own. We see him tumbling away from the airplane. Far below his chute BLOSSOMS OPEN.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What's so damn funny?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Been to any good diners lately?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Nobody told me this was a costume party.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Heads up, man. What's this thing on my back?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: A parachute. This does not argue well.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This is bullshit! Hey!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I get the picture.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: We see three chutes coming down. The first two HIT HARD. We ROCKET IN on the last chute as Xander lands like a pro. The other guys run up to him. Then they hear SHOUTING in SPANISH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They wrestle out of their chutes and push past each other as they TAKE OFF IN DIFFERENT DIRECTIONS. Xander runs low down a culvert. There's SHOUTING all around. He flattens down and crawls up over the rise. What he sees stuns him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We crane up to reveal A FIELD OF POT PLANTS. There's a COCAINE PROCESSING PLANT along the field's edge. The whole place looks exactly like a Central American DRUG FARM.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Jee-zus, man! What the hell now? Another damn test? T.J. We should head for those trees.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't look at me, brother. It's every man for himself.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You gotta be kidding me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: run around with AK-47's. Xander sneaks past EQUIPMENT covered in CAMOUFLAGE NETTING. A squad of Narcos runs by and Xander makes his move. He rounds another pile of equipment and comes right into the HEADLIGHTS of a truck. Narcos hop out and charge forward. Xander raises his hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They grab him and haul him away.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You boys are too good for me. Guess I failed this one, huh?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: We see a RUSTY MEAT HOOK. A CHAIN is wrapped around it. Attached to the chain, his arms over his head, is Xander. He's in the middle of a bleak looking room. There are BLOODSTAINS on the wooden walls, the floor strewn with filthy HAY. Behind him against the wall Xander sees T.J. and Virg both HOG-TIED.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a BLOOD STAINED TOWEL COVERING a TABLE near the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then they hear talking outside and the door is UNLOCKED. A very nasty looking Marco comes in. By his look he's the LEADER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Narco Guards bring in one of their PARACHUTES and toss it on the floor. They exit, closing the door behind them. Jefe goes to the table throws back the towel. Beneath it are HIDEOUS, BLOOD ENCRUSTED TORTURE DEVICES: a HACK SAW, a BOLT CUTTERS, KNIVES, CHISELS, a BLOW TORCH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: T.J. and Virg both crack up. Jefe gives them a withering look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jefe passes his hand over the various tools. He finally settles on a crude MACHETE. He walks amongst them brandishing it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He stops in front of Xander.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He BACKHANDS Xander across the face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jefe SLAPS him again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander looks over at T.J. and Virg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A low THUMPING is heard outside. It's the sound of approaching HELICOPTERS, lots of them. Then the night ERUPTS in GUNFIRE. It sounds like a full scale assault outside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jefe goes into a fury. He SWINGS his machete at Xander's legs. Xander JUMPS UP, grabbing on to the chain above, and KICKS Jefe in the chest. Jefe falls back and Xander climbs up to the roof BEAM. He grabs onto the beam with his legs and UNHOOKS his chain from the meat hook. He drops down, six feet of chain still hanging from his cuffed wrists, and Jefe comes charging at him. Xander dodges a few wild swings. He grabs Jefe's PANT CUFF and dumps him on his ass. Jefe scrambles to his feet, drawing his PISTOL. Xander swings his chain and WHIPS the gun out of Jefe's hand. With another swing he WRAPS the chain around Jefe's neck and pulls it taught.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jefe nods, choking, and reaches into his pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Instead Jefe hurls them out the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander jerks the chain, slamming Jefe head first into the wall. Jefe drops, knocked out. Outside it sounds like a full scale FIREFIGHT. Xander gets the machete and CUTS the ropes holding T.J. and Virg. Then a HAIL OF BULLETS sprays through the room. All three guys hit the deck but T.J. gets shot. He clutches his side, BLOOD all over his hands. T.J. I'm hit! I'm hit!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander knows this is true.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He checks out T.J.'s wound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Virg bolts for the door.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: So much for "every man for himself". Nice to see you again, fellas. T.J. They really went all out on this one. This is a pretty gnarly setup.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Check the table in the corner.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This oughta be good.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This must be el jefe. How's it goin' jefe? Some weather we're havin'.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What's on the menu tonight? The old blowtorch-to-the-family jewels routine, I'll bet. Hey, you want roasted nuts, let's break out the Planters.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Do you know what we do with people come round here? You know what we do with people come in our business?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We cut the Achilles tendon. Your feet flop around like a marionette. You ain't walkin' nowhere no more. Sound good, tough guy? Or maybe instead you wanna tell me something.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Whatchu doing here?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, I don't know. It was an accident.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's some accident, hombre. You accidentally fall out of a plane in the middle of the night and land up in my back yard.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We seen this kind of parachutes before, you know. U.S. Army. You got some friends here, jump out with you guys?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're anti-social. We don't have any friends.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No friends, huh? That's funny, I don't know no U.S. Army that comes without no friends. That's cuz U.S. Army is pussies. They always come with the five hundred guys and the helicopters and the see-in-the-dark glasses. So don't you tell me you all alone out here, my friend. You bullshitting the wrong guy.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Who's writing this dude's dialogue?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He's a pretty good actor, though. T.J. Makes the diner look like a sixth grade play. He's even got them crazy eyes.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You ain't begun to see crazy yet, amigo.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're on to the game, ese. You got the fake blood splattered all over the walls, you got your torture tools... It's all very cute. But come on, let's quit while you're ahead. I'm only trying to save you a beatin'.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You saving me? You talking pretty tough for a guy got himself chained to the ceiling.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (shrugs) Alright. You wanna eat through a tube, be my guest.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Now you're gonna make me enjoy this, funny guy. Now I'm gonna take the whole foot off. Whatchu think of that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What's that, eh? I thought you didn't have no friends!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Keys. You got 'em?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hand 'em to me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I hope you're getting paid extra for this.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They're shooting for real! This is all real.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Aw shit.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Help me with this guy.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's like you said, every man for himself.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That only works if you're a man!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Narcos are shouting, running to and fro.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: cut through the air. They are trying to repel an UNSEEN ASSAULT FORCE. Overhead SIX MILITARY HELICOPTERS buzz the compound like Apocalypse Now, their NIGHT SUNS lighting up the place. Xander comes out of the torture building holding T.J. in a fireman's carry. His hands are still CUFFED, the length of chain dragging. Xander crouches behind some equipment, putting T.J. on the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander moves on, finds cover under the camouflage netting. He can see Narcos shooting into the trees at the UNSEEN ENEMY. Looking the other way, he spots Virg running back his way. He's been corralled by one of the Helicopters. He's zigzagging, trying to stay out of the beam of it's Night Sun. Xander darts out and GRABS him, pulling him under the camouflage netting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Helicopter lights up the camouflage netting. They're pinned down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They squat down in runners stances, the helicopter kicking up DUST all around them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They jet off in opposite directions. Xander books, running for all he's worth. His cuffed hands and the dangling chain make it difficult. He's heading straight into the FIELD OF POT PLANTS. Suddenly the massive SPOTLIGHT picks him out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The CHOPPER swoops down after him. Its big GATLING GUNS turn, aiming right at him.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You alright? T.J. I used to be a SEAL, it's not the first time I've been shot. Thanks, man.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Keep your head down, I'll be right back. I'm gonna steal us some wheels.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They're all over the place! What the hell's going on?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Looks like we're in the middle of the drug war.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Alright Mr. free-for-all, you go that way, I'm gonna go this way. They can't follow us both.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Go!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Shit!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ! The guns cut loose, tearing up the ground right behind him. Xander sprints, the chopper after him like Cary Grant in "North By Northwest", except instead of corn fields, Xander's running through a field of HUGE MARIJUANA PLANTS. Xander hits the deck and the chopper soars over him. Xander cuts over a couple rows and hunkers down amongst the plants. All around him it's a chaos of Helicopters and GUNFIRE. Two choppers attack the factory building, BLASTING it with their guns. Narcos run terrified. Xander notices a FAT PURPLE BUD on the plant right in front of him. He SNAPS IT OFF.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He tucks it-into his shirt and takes off through the POT FOREST. Xander finally spots a vehicle. It's a TRUCK LADEN WITH BAILS OF COCAINE. He heads for it. Then the SPOTLIGHT finds him again and the Chopper swings around. The gatling guns RIP the plants to pieces all around him. Xander hauls ass, heading for the truck. Bullets chew up the dirt all around him. As the helicopter passes overhead, it's guns RAKE THE TRUCK. There is a FLASH as the GAS TANK goes up.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: TRUCK LADEN WITH BAILS OF COCAINE

dialogue.raw_text: I'm gonna need to hit the trees after a night like this.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: A SUPERNOVA OF FIRE AND HIGH-GRADE COKE

direction.raw_text: ! A SUPERNOVA OF FIRE AND HIGH-GRADE COKE erupts into the night air. Xander dives into a DRAINAGE DITCH. He tumbles down into FILTHY WATER. A powdery cloud washes over him, dusting the trees white. Near him is a big DRAINPIPE leeching sewage. Xander crawls inside. The Chopper makes another pass overhead. The big spotlight plays over the area, then moves on. Xander gives a sigh of relief. He crawls out of the drainpipe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: race by on the road right above him as MILITARY MEN flood the compound. There's no going back. Xander turns and makes his way along the tree line. The chopper and gunfire are in the distance now. Things are quieter here and he starts to relax. Bad idea. As he goes by, one of the TREES moves. He takes a few more steps and the grass he just walked on EXPLODES UPWARDS. ARMS reach out, tackling Xander from behind. Another TEAM of BLACK OPS SOLDIERS bursts from the weeds, the bushes, all perfectly camouflaged like the landscape. They fall on him like a curtain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - Soldiers hold him down while a BLACK HOOD is pulled over his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the MASSIVE HANGER DOORS CLOSE we can see CHOPPERS taking off and landing. MEXICAN SOLDIERS load Jefe and his Narcos onto a FEDERALE BUS. Virg resists and is BEATEN. T.J. can be seen being loaded into an AMBULANCE. The hanger doors slide shut with a THUD. We see Xander's HANDS as the CHAINS are cut away. Xander sits in a chair with the BLACK HOOD still over his head. He blinks when the hood is torn off. A Black Ops Soldier smirks as he walks away. Xander looks around, sees the Black Ops Team unpacking some STRANGE GEAR. Two of them are dumping bottles of a CLEAR LIQUID into a RUSTY CLAWFOOT BATHTUB.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Black Ops guys grin knowingly. On the other side, Xander sees a FLIGHT CREW readying a GULFSTREAM for travel. Gibbons steps up from behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander gets up and Gibbons leads him on a stroll around the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As they walk by the Black Ops guys, Xander sees they're getting busy. One spreads out a plastic DROPCLOTH. Another plugs in a BONE SAW.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gibbons grabs a CHICKEN LEG from a guy eating lunch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He tosses it into the tub. Instantly it starts to SIZZLE and BUBBLE. The tub is full of ACID.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In seconds the entire leg has been consumed, leaving only a oily cloud of residue. Gibbons eyes him coldly, nailing the point home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gibbons kicks the back of Xander's leg and dumps him on his ass. Gibbons was so quick, Xander never saw it coming. The Black Ops guys clap and cheer, always interested in a fight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander gets up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gibbons lunges and grabs Xander's throat in the vice-like grip of his thumb and middle finger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The fingers are so powerful that Xander is paralysed. He looks over, sees the bone saw start revving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gibbons releases his grip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then Xander starts walking away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Black Ops guys grab weapons, ready to stop him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander climbs up the steps of the Gulfstream.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Nice of you to draw me a bath. Is it Saturday already?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Congratulations, you've just graduated at the head of your class.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're a cold piece of work. You almost got three people killed out there.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Good thing you were there to save the day. Come walk with me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You've really got me confused, Cage. On the one hand you showed leadership, courage under fire, a willingness to protect men you hardly knew... and on the other you have an arrest record that pegs you as near sociopathic. Help me out here. I'm not following your evolution.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You want the cheap backstory? The runaway mom, the suicide dad and the foster homes? Gimme a break. You're not interested in my past, you're interested in my future as some kind of spy.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're perceptive too. I forgot to add that to the list of surprises. I'm with the National Security Agency. And unlikely as it may sound, I need your help.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm not interested. I've already got a job.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're an adrenaline junkie with one foot in the penitentiary. You risk your ass building a daredevil myth that means nothing and you're not getting any younger.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I plan on getting a lot older. And playing spy games sounds like a quick way to get yourself dead.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's too bad. I thought a guy like you would appreciate the challenge.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What's this? You're gonna try to scare me now?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Do you know the reason why I try to recruit guys like you? There's no risk.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There's nobody back home who's gonna ask questions if you just... disappear for a while.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Now I'm the one who's nauseous. So what's the deal? What do you need me for?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There's some folks I want to keep tabs on. Dirty, tattooed, uncivilized. Your kind of people.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What do I get out of it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: If you find out what I want to know, and if I'm able to successfully use that information, you get to go back to your degenerate little life. If not, you take a bath.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're one sick bastard. A sadist with a badge looking to rope me in to a suicide mission. I think no matter which way I go I'm likely to wind up face down on a sheet of plastic. So here's my answer: kiss my ass, Hop-along.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Not bad for a gimp.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What's with that "X" on the back of your head? Does that mean you're "extreme"? I've got some news for you, Mr. X, you're a three time loser. So maybe you should tattoo another couple of X's on your head.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'll take that under advisement. Maybe I can be like you and lose a leg for the old Stars and Bars. I bet the flag's a great comfort every time you need help climbing stairs.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: One twitch and my finger and thumb will meet inside your esophagus. Believe me, Mr. X, I've put foot to ass for my country on many occasions and I don't feel the urge to stop just yet. So think carefully before you tell me: Is "kiss my ass, Hop- along" your final answer?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (choking) No.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I thought you might see it my way.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Where you going, X? I said where you going?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You tell me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There better be a movie on this Goddam flight.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Xander sits with Gibbons in big leather chairs. They are surrounded by NSA AGENTS in suits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: snaps an ANKLET around Xander's ankle.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: How about a pedicure as long as you're down there. What's this? Lo-Jack?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Wherever you go on the planet, I'll find you. There's no quitting. If you try to take it off, a ring of needles will inject enough curare into your bloodstream to kill you before you hit the ground. Is all that clear?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah, I spy or I die.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Orange light floods this beautiful airline lounge. There's a fully stocked bar, a snack table, all unused. That's because it's been sealed off for NSA use. (NOTE: perfect product placement opportunity for an AIRLINE). Xander, Gibbons and his Men are all silhouetted against the smoked glass windows. The Nerdy Agent hands Xander a Palm Pilot sized ELECTRONIC DEVICE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gibbons checks his watch. They get up and start walking.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: This is your communicator. You'll identify yourself by a call sign. From here on out you're Bulldog Omega 5.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You must stay up late to come up with shit like that.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I expect you to call in regularly with progress reports.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Fine, but I'm not gonna be no Bulldog Omega 5.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The phalanx of Agents surrounds Xander and Gibbons as they walk to the gate. The Nerdy Agent hurries to catch up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They walk past the gate, down the jet-way, the Agents FLASH BADGES to the GATE WORKERS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander is the last one to board the plane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the door closes, he looks back at Gibbons and his phalanx of Agents.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The jet's door CLOSES.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Uh... Call signs derive from the parameters of the mission.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: If he doesn't like it, we can make an exception just this once. We'll call him "Triple X".
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Up yours.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Crude and defiant as always, Triple X. It fits so well because you're obscene.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Is that all?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Just remember, I'll be watching.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I've got something for you to chew on. Next time you send someone to save the world, make sure they like the planet the way it is.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Xander is in the last row against the bulkhead. He's got a personal DVD player and headphones and he's reviewing his mission. The high-tech screen shows photos, maps, cool graphics. The KID sitting across the aisle leans over for a look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The kid moves to the seat next to Xander. Onscreen see photos of the FIVE BAD GUYS from the opening sequence. We DIVE IN to the computer as Xander describes them. For each of the baddies, we'll see 3-D PHOTOS and VIDEO CLIPS, all enhanced with COMPUTER GRAPHICS and POP-UP MENUS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We see ANDERS, the wild-eyed and unclean Swedish biker, against a backdrop of MOTORCYCLES and MUSCLE CARS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We see Viktor, with the goatee and belly, doing some hairy snowboarding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We see Kirill in UNIFORM with his well used SNIPER RIFLE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He indicates Petra, the tough gangster chick. With her LEATHER and TATTOOS she looks like she could mop up the floor with Lara Croft.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Finally we see YORGI, the unlikely looking Mafiya Don. We see CRIME SCENE PHOTOS that illustrate his exploits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander clicks on "INVENTORY". He scrolls through a staggering array of WEAPONS and VEHICLES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Kid's mom calls him back to his seat. Xander looks at the kid, then gets back to his research.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What game is that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Slick graphics, huh? See these dudes? They're called "Anarchy 99", they're the bad guy bosses.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Do they have any special powers? The bosses always have special powers.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You wanna check it out? Come here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: First we've got Anders, the psycho looking biker. In charge of transportation and smuggling. Controls every trucking union in Eastern Europe. Don't look too clean, either.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Next we got a Siberian redneck, Viktor. Into snowmobiles and snowboarding. So naturally, he covers prostitution and the drug trade.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Naturally.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This guy's kinda dorky lookin'.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Kirill, the sniper. Looks like a bookworm, but he had 72 confirmed kills in Chechnya, they called him the "Finger of God". Assassination and weapons.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Who's the hottie?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You like her, huh? Petra. She runs their finances, money laundering, computers. Joined the gang after spending some time as the girlfriend of this dude, Yorgi Azar Zimin. Capo of Anarchy 99.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yorgi masterminded the take-over of three Red Mafiya clans. Cops called it "blood week". He combined all of their global enterprises into one huge crime syndicate: Anarchy 99.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (skeptically) "Anarchy" 99"?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What are you gonna do? They're Euro- trash.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What weapons do you have?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Just about anything I want, it looks like. This is gonna be tough, though. There's no way to save this game. I gotta get it right the first time through.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What do you get if you finish?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Nothing, really. My guy is just doing it to stay alive.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh. I bet by the end he gets something out of it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Like what?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He gets to be the hero.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: We CRANE UP from the COBBLESTONE STREET as a BEAT-UP CAR races by. We rise up, revealing PRAGUE in all it's glory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander sits in the back, wedged between TWO IDENTICAL LOOKING TOUGH GUYS. If you were to call Central Casting and ask for a couple of cold war spy types, this is what they'd send. They're both 6' 4", have sloppily cut hair, square jaws, wrinkled overcoats.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The two tough guys flash their COP ID's. Xander studies them. "IVAN PEDGRAG" and "IVAN PODROV".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He looks out the window, sees a GRAND HOTEL. They drive right on by.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: This is bullshit, man, I wanna see some ID.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're both named Ivan? That's gotta be confusing on Valentine's Day. So where we headed? Fellas, I said where we headed? (beat) Yeah, whatever.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: It's a crumbling old dump in a nasty part of town. Xander shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ivan 1 pulls Xander's gear bag from the trunk and throws it on the sidewalk. Xander picks it up and carries it into the building.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: James Bond never had to put up with this shit.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Dumpy furniture, roaches, cracked windows. Xander is ushered in. There's another GUY in a UGLY SUIT waiting. He is DETECTIVE MILAN SLOVO.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ivan 1 shoves him into a chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander lays down on the bed. Slovo stares, burning with hatred. He heads to the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Slovo exits. Ivans 1 & 2 stay, staring at Xander.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Sit down.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I've been on a plane for twelve hours, I think I'll stand.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: My name is Slovo, Czech secret police. When you are here you are under my jurisdiction, you take my orders, you do what I say. If you become any kind of an inconvenience, I'll shoot you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Here we go again.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're here because your government is putting pressure on my government. This is an internal affair, a Czech affair, that you are interfering with. I will warn you once: Don't shit in my lawn. Get whatever information your government seeks and get our.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: First of all, you should kill whoever sold you that suit. Two, I don't wanna be here either, so just step off. Three, if you had the authority to shoot me you would've done it by now, so just ease up on the machismo, bitch. Now that we've got that sorted out, I'm gonna get some rest.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Be ready in three hours.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: A fancy, flashy disco with an extreme sports theme. A big bouncer in a leather coat works the door. This is a highclass, expensive joint but it still looks seedy and dangerous. Xander and Slovo walk up to the place. Xander's wearing a Tshirt that says "RON JEREMY: AMERICAN LEGEND" complete with a photo of the Hedgehog.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: that looks like a runway model SLIDES across the stage on SKATEBOARD KNEE-PADS while PATRONS cheer. The disco is a combination STRIP-CLUB and CONCERT VENUE. All the STRIPPERS are outfitted in HELMETS, ELBOW PADS, G-STRINGS and BELLY SHIRTS. There's a WARPED TOUR BAND playing on a STAGE. On either side of the stage are two MINI-HALF PIPES that the GIRLS are cutting back and forth on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: sit in plush booths getting table dances while the dance floor is packed with sexily dressed YOUNG HIPSTERS. Xander gets a beer from a BUXOM COCKTAIL WAITRESS on IN-LINE SKATES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Slovo points them out in the far corner. They're surrounded by straight faced BODYGUARDS. What ANARCHY 99 is doing in their booth with the STRIPPERS looks like Led Zeppelin on tour. Booze, broads, good times... These guys are living like rock stars. They're all here: Anders the biker, Viktor, Kirill. In the middle sit Yorgi and Petra. Petra's wearing an "I AM EVIL" Tshirt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He looks around but Xander is gone. He heads for the exit, pushing his way through the crowd. But then he spots him, not by the door but deeper in the club.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He sees Xander walk right up to the Anarchy 99 booth and start talking to them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Slovo can't hear a thing, but they're obviously interested in what he has to say. Next thing he knows Xander is pointing at him and waving him over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Slovo makes his way through the crowd to the booth. Yorgi looks him up and down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander grabs Slovo and starts searching him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He slams Slovo up against the wall and pulls out Slovo's police badge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Bodyguards pull out guns and Slovo rushes for the emergency exit in a panic. In seconds he's out and gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yorgi waves over some strippers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yorgi nods and the Bodyguards step in front of Xander.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander turns to leave. That's when Anders notices the "X" tattoo on the back of Xander's head. He gets excited and alerts Yorgi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander turns. Suddenly their whole demeanor changes. All five guys get up, awed, and push the Bodyguards out of the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yorgi signals for more drinks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Petra elbows Anders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Petra glances at Yorgi who nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander looks to Yorgi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Petra scrawls numbers on a cocktail napkin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander snatches the napkin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Petra glares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yorgi claps and a flock of strippers descends on the booth. Anarchy 99 lifts their glasses. Xander joins in the toast.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Nice hops.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The corner. Anarchy 99.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: See the one with the funny colored hair? Crazy bitch stabbed one of my men in the knee-cap. There they are, American. The low-rent millionaire criminals. And you thought only your country had white trash. American?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh no!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Jesus Christ!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (horrified) What the hell...?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's the guy.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This pizda? Never seen him before.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Slovo) Who you workin' for? What do you do for a living, dickhead?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Uh... I am... I work in insurance.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (panicked whisper) What the hell are you doing?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Look what we have here. Czech 5-0 on the mack.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Cops. Like a plague. No matter how many you pay there's always another with his hand out. How did you pick him out?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He flashed his badge to half the bar when he bought his drink.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I appreciate you bringing this to our attention. Whatever you want, the rest of the night, consider it on the house.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Thanks, but I'm here on business. I heard you're the G around here. I'm looking for some cars, expensive ones. A lot of them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sorry, man, don't know what you're talking about.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm talking about the sports cars that disappear off the docks in Genoa and wind up here. If you don't know about 'em, who does?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I guess I heard wrong.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Xander Cage!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The X man! We seen your bootleg videos!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You sick! You sick crazy on a board, on a bike! Everything!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This is insane, man. Xander Cage in Prague. Come on, sit. Sit with us.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I remember that one where you jump the motorcycle over the freeway at rush hour.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: When else are you gonna do it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You almost died on that one.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Cops arrested me while I was still in surgery. Did two months.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We seen all your shit! So you want cars? We get whatever cars you need. What are you looking for?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ferrari's, Lamborghini's... high end pasta rockets. Ten to start.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ten! No problem! We do that no problem!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ten is hardly worth the effort. We're talking a lousy million five U.S.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I have Japanese buyers who are looking to move a fleet, if you have the quality of merchandise they're after. And it's a mil two, max.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Do you know what a wire transfer is?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Is she for real? Honey, maybe you should quiet down and let the grownups have a conversation.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: My goodness, a word with four syllables. I should get some ice before your brain gets too hot.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sure. Just chisel some off your heart.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (smiles) So cute. He shows up for a battle of wits with a mental butter knife.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (laughing) Don't look at me, X, she handles all the details.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It'll work faster if I have an account number.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You'll have forty-eight hours to complete the transfer. Don't waste our time.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Wouldn't dream of it. I'm even gonna throw in a few extra bucks to send you to charm school.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Alright, now that business is finished, we party! Bitches, come! We have a drink and toast the deal!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I believe I can hang with you fellas for a while.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: We see the FEET of AGENT POLK sprinting down the hallway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Agent Polk looks around, spots Gibbons. He rushes to him, waving a COMMUNIQUE. Gibbons grabs the communique, reads it. He looks up, stunned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander is having coffee at his window when his communicator RINGS.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (into phone) I guess you got my E-mail. I set up a purchase. Ten cars.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: If you're trying to push my buttons, you're on the right track. Don't make me question my own judgment, X.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander hangs up.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Buddy, you sent me here to get close to their organization, that costs money.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: One point two million dollars? I did not authorize you to spend one point two million dollars!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm already on a first name basis with these dudes, I got a deal set up, you want me to hammer it or not?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're not after car thieves here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What the hell am I after? You're telling me dick.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That information is classified. You're there to gather information on their operations, period.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Call me crazy, but I thought hooking up a million dollar deal was a great way to get on their good side. What else? You gonna hassle me about the weapons and spy stuff too?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: My friend, if you're planning on crossing me...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I know, poison needles in my shins. You've got 36 hours. Peace, out.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Gibbons stands before Sam's desk. Sam scans over the communique.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gibbons smiles.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Ridiculous. Cut him off. I'm sorry Gibbons, you pulled up a shark this time.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I think we should send him whatever he wants.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You what? A wire transfer of this size?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: If it means getting Silent Night back, absolutely.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're talking about a very expensive risk here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He's gotten closer in 24 hours than all of the other operatives combined. He got us an account number to boot. Now even if he's just dumb and lucky, I say we back his play. (beat) I put him out there, Sam. If he doesn't come up with the money, they'll kill him. I can't let that happen.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Why not? You were going to throw him in a tub full of acid, weren't you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Alright, do what you want. But keep the screws on him. He's a wild card. That could be either good or bad.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: So the odds are up to fifty-fifty? I can deal with that.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: comes flying in, a MAN standing out on the strut. He's a disgruntled GADGET WRANGLER from the NSA. His name is TOBY LEE SHAVERS. Slovo and Xander watch from a distance as a series of METAL CASES is unloaded by CZECH COPS. Slovo lets out a low whistle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shavers walks up to them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shavers gives him a disapproving look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Slovo gestures towards the stairs and Shavers marches off, muttering to himself.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Your government must know something we don't.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hate those Russkie choppers. Rattle- trap pieces of garbage. I'm agent Shavers. Toby Lee Shavers. I'm looking for what's his name. Three X' s.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's would be me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Figures. You got someplace we can spread out my gear or what? I mean today.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'll leave you two alone to talk.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah, thanks a lot.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Down in the basement there is a SHOOTING RANGE along one wall. A squad of CZECH COPS is BLASTING AWAY. They become distracted by the noise in the middle of the room. One of the metal boxes has been dropped by a Cop. The rest are spread out in front of Xander, Slovo and Shavers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shavers pops open the first metal case. Inside are various GADGETS laid into the molded carbon fiber lining.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shavers holds up a small METAL BALL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The metal ball unrolls into a six legged ROBOT INSECT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander picks it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shavers snatches it back. He puts on a METAL GLOVE, it's fingers are SHARP TALONS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He CLAMPS the claw onto the metal case. It holds fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He tosses the glove aside, pulls out a DART GUN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shavers displays a case of DARTS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander pulls out some SUPER BINOCULARS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander looks through them, starts cycling through the different modes.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Back off, just go away you klutz. Alright, here's the story. The items in these cases belong to me. I designed them, built them, and was going to use them in the field myself until you showed up.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I stole your beat, huh? Guess you forgot to brown-nose the right people.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Is that supposed to be funny? I'm not laughing. I've worked for ten years to get my shot at being a field agent, funny boy. And ar the last minute I get bumped by you, some reject from the Ozzfest.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Why don't you show me some gear before you get hurt.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Listen to you. Right away, sir, anything you say, sir.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What is all this? I didn't even order some of this stuff.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're gonna need it, rookie, trust me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: An all-terrain mobile video monitoring system for surveillance. I call it the "Roach Cam". See the little camera it's got for a head?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Kinda looks like you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: "Terminator" climbing claws.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Miniature power cams set in on contact, giving you a sure grip on any surface.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They come in any other styles or colors?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This is your standard dart gun.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That one I'm real familiar with.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You've got your chromium knock-out dart, microphone listening dart, explosive dart, even one with a splatter blood packet, whatever you need. They also come in a special 9mm casing for use with your service pistol.

dialogue.raw_text: Multi-view binoculars. Nine different enhanced vision modes, plus a digital camera.

direction.raw_text: - we see the various modes as Xander scans the grounds.

dialogue.raw_text: Infrared, starlight... Even a special "penetrator" mode to see through walls, curtains, almost anything...

direction.raw_text: - we see through the clothes of the FEMALE COPS on the shooting range. (PG-13 style, of course). We can even see the INNER WORKINGS of their GUNS. One of the Female Cops turns and gives Xander an approving look.
