direction.raw_text: Shavers just gives him a deadpan look.

dialogue.raw_text: I think I'll hang on to these.

dialogue.raw_text: You're joking, right?

result.heading: TEN BLACK MARKET EUROPEAN SPORTS CARS

direction.raw_text: The TEN BLACK MARKET EUROPEAN SPORTS CARS are loaded on two TRANSPORT TRUCKS. Mafiya BODYGUARDS keep watch. The Ivans (in Teamster garb) inspect the cars while Xander supervises. Anders hovers around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sitting in an OFFICE watching are Yorgi, Kirill and Petra. Petra has a LAPTOP.

direction.raw_text: Petra checks her computer. ON SCREEN she's monitoring their BANK ACCOUNT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Outside the Ivans nod approval and Xander heads to the office. Yorgi looks to kirill, who puts his hand on his PISTOL. Xander opens the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just then Petra's computer BEEPS and the MONEY floods into their account. Xander holds up a CELL PHONE and smiles.

direction.raw_text: He nods for Kirill to stand down.

dialogue.raw_text: So what you think? Beautiful!

dialogue.raw_text: Has it arrived yet?

dialogue.raw_text: Nothing. He had two days.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Perhaps he is not all he says he is.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Very nice. I'm impressed.

dialogue.raw_text: I'm somewhat less so. We seem to have a bit of a problem...

dialogue.raw_text: I had to inspect the merchandise first.

dialogue.raw_text: Of course.

direction.raw_text: They work their way through the lunchtime crowd.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I can't let this happen. I want you to go out the back. I'll make up some excuse.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They'll kill you, you know they will. Besides, there is no back door. Keep smiling. Ready? Now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Xander's timed it perfectly so that just as they get to the door, a BUS passes by. Kirill keeps focused, waiting for the bus to pass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: THROUGH SCOPE - Xander's head is sporadically visible through the bus windows. Kirill's finger tightens on the trigger... As soon as the bus passes he FIRES! But Xander's not there, he's ducked down to tie his shoe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The glass door behind him shatters. Feigning surprise, Xander PUNCHES PETRA IN THE FACE and sprints down the block. He runs bent low, the parked cars protecting him from the sniper. Kirill fires anyway, taking out car windows. At the end of the block is a long staircase with a METAL RAIL down the middle. As he runs by an outdoor restaurant Xander snatches the SERVING TRAY from a startled WAITER, sending food and drink flying. He hops on the serving tray like it's a skateboard and does a RAIL-SLIDE down the length of the stairs. He's moving too fast for Kirill. He jumps off at the bottom and the tray POPS UP INTO THE AIR. Kirill BLASTS it like a clay pigeon. By now Xander is out of sight. Kirill pounds his rifle in frustration. Petra gets to the top of the stairs. She gives Kirill a "Where did he go?" look. Her nose is bloody, helping to sell her performance. Then she turns and looks off after Xander. She sees his GTO speeding away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're looking down at a SHIP moving through the fjord, seen from high above. It's towing a SMALLER BOAT behind it. An airplane? No, we're at the top of the Trollveggen, Norway's legendary "Troll Wall". It's a near 5,000 foot sheer drop to the ocean. Six figures stand at the edge of the barren cliff. They wear webbed "squirrel" jumpsuits, helmets and parachutes. On each thigh they have pistols and on their chests they have silenced MP-5 sub-machine guns. Together they stare down at the ship. Petra is among them. She looks down at her watch. It is precisely 5:59PM. She glances around. The top of the cliff is rocky and flat. Xander is nowhere to be seen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - we see Xander sneaking forward military style. He's got his "stakeout suit" on and is keeping low.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : "6 PM" The members of Anarchy 99 put on their goggles and, without saying a word, they leap off the Troll Wall. Xander runs to the edge and looks down. He sees the group freefailing down the sheer cliff face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The six plummet away from him at incredible speed. In a hard arch, they peak at 120 m.p.h. Then, using the webbed wings under their arms and between their legs, they go into aerodynamic "track" positions and rocket away from the wall. Like dark angels, they soar out over the water in formation.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Very nice.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The ship below is a scientific research vessel. On the deck, a few SAILORS and SCIENTISTS watch the sun set. The six dark figures close in rapidly. At the last moment they pull their chutes and deftly glide towards the ship. A sailor looks up and spots them. Before he can shout, he's SHOT IN THE LEG and goes down. Seconds later, they're on the deck, tearing off their rigs. They race across the deck, taking over the ship in a surgical manner. They herd everyone back heading for the bridge. Petra hangs back. She looks back at the cliff, up towards Xander.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Through his SUPER BINOCULARS we see them storming the bridge. As they head inside, they disappear from view. Xander hits a button on the side of the binoculars.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Let's see what's going on inside...
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: THROUGH THE WALLS OF THE SHIP

direction.raw_text: Now he can see THROUGH THE WALLS OF THE SHIP. He sees THE CREW, herded into a room and LOCKED IN by Anarchy 99.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anarchy 99 seals the door, locking the crew away. They slap five and bump chests, still totally amped up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON - a LARGE SUBMERSIBLE VEHICLE. It's white and twelve feet long. There are MOTORS on either side and a PANEL OF SOLAR CELLS on the top of a periscope-like projection rising from the back. This is the AHAB DEVICE. It sits in the WET WELL at the back of the ship, ready to be launched out the back sea doors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is a SMALLER BOAT moored to the back of the ship. Kirill and Viktor hop onto it's deck. They start to WHISTLE as they work. Sounds like the "Andy Griffith" theme.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Ready the boat.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: He takes DIGITAL PHOTOS of the Ahab device.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What the hell are you guys stealing?
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: TIE AHAB TO THE BACK OF THE SMALLER BOAT

direction.raw_text: The smaller boat is launched and ready to do. Yorgi goes to the WET WELL CONTROLS and hits a switch. The aft doors open, letting water into the wet well. In seconds Ahab starts to float. Anders loosens it from it's moorings and they TIE AHAB TO THE BACK OF THE SMALLER BOAT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yorgi hits another switch, opening the BALLAST DOORS on the port side of the ship. Air flows out, causing the ship to list to one side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yorgi MACHINE GUNS the wet well control panel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They climb onto the boat. Petra is the last to board. She looks up towards Xander and MACHINE GUNS the panel some more, making sure he notices.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Ready.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What are you doing?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It all happened so fast. Such an unfortunate accident.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Let's go.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: He sees the smaller boat pulling away, the Ahab device being towed behind. He pans over and ZOOMS IN on the shot-up control panel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He pans over to the wet well and sees it's flooding. With the ballast open on only one side, the ship starts LISTING. The thing is going down. He pans over, clicks into "penetrator" mode, and sees the Crew pounding on the walls below decks. They're trapped, their WRISTS AND ANKLES BOUND WITH PLEXI-CUFFS.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: WRISTS AND ANKLES BOUND WITH PLEXI-CUFFS

dialogue.raw_text: What the hell...?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Xander puts down the binoculars and gets up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He pats his jumpsuit, checking for the buckle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander steels himself, takes a few deep breaths. Then he sprints to the edge and JUMPS off the cliff... And that's it. He's gone. One mile, straight down. Suddenly we're falling with him. We hear the rush of air as he free-falls a dozen feet from the craggy rock face. The force of the wind ripples his cheeks. He streamlines himself into a track position and jets away from the cliff like Superman. Before he gets too low, he RIPS THE BUCKLE. Immediately his jumpsuit TEARS OFF HIS BODY in MULTIPLE LAYERS, unfurling into a full sized PARASAIL. Xander looks up at his parasail, relieved, and glides towards the ship.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: No way, man, no way. I'm just supposed to be an observer. Aw shit. This job sucks.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Toby Lee Shavers, if this thing don't work, your ass is kicked.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Petra spots the parasail and has to act quickly to keep Yorgi from spotting it. She grabs him suddenly and KISSES him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yorgi kisses her again and heads to the cabin below.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What was that for?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'd forgotten how exciting it is working together.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You've been so quiet lately, Petra, I thought you no longer cared.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Why don't we go below decks and work off some of this adrenaline.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (smiles) Viktor! Stay the course.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Xander comes in for a perfect landing. He lands on the listing deck and undoes his harness. He sees several WOUNDED scattered on the deck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He looks across the water, sees the smaller boat far away.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Son of a bitch!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Petra looks back one last time, catching sight of Xander on the deck of the ship. She smiles, relieved. Then she turns solemn as she heads below decks to pay the price.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander gets to the wet well and sees the water flooding in. With the ship listing like this, the water is pouring below decks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander opens a hatch and lowers himself into the hold. Here is where the entire Crew has been left to drown. They are struggling to stay above water, their hands and feet bound. As the far end of the room is another HATCH. Water pours in from this one and Xander has to get it shut. He swims through the struggling Crew, spots the CAPTAIN holding his YOUNG SON above water. The water is rising rapidly, filling up the compartment. Xander braces his feet against the bulkhead and PUSHES, but the force of the water is too much. He surfaces. He's got to wait until the room floods before he can close that door. He watches as the Crew goes into a panic, the water rising up to the ceiling. They are gasping in the last foot of air that's available. He sees the Captain's Son, crying and clutching at his father. Xander takes a deep breath and dives down. He grabs the hatch door, braces his feet and PULLS. His muscles strain as the heavy metal door slowly swings SHUT. Xander surfaces and swims to the ladder. He CUTS the Captain's plastic cuffs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Captain takes the knife and swims to free his men. Xander takes the Captain's Son and climbs up the ladder.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Is the boy alright?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes. I will cut the others loose, you must run the bilge pumps!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Xander scans the controls but has no idea what he's looking for. The Captain's Son shows him the right switch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Son nods and Xander flips the switch. MOTORS start to HUM.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You sure?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The bilge pumps spew out water furiously. Crew members come up from below decks. They are soaked and grateful. They go about tending to the wounded as Xander slumps down next to the exhausted Captain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They both laugh, relieved, as the ship slowly rights itself.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Captain, huh? You get a lot of broads with that uniform?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Xander is in a room with the SCIENTISTS from the ship. They have blueprints of the torpedo spread out. The Captain's Son is wrapped in BLANKETS, shivering. Xander is talking to Gibbons on his communicator.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (into communicator) They call it "Ahab", it's a solar powered submersible. It can circumnavigate the globe on it's own. They use it to track and study the migration patterns of whales.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Gibbons jots down the information furiously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander tussles the hair of the Captain's Son.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You did say "Ahab"? You're sure about that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah, I sent you pictures. Here's what I'm thinking. If they take out the cameras and sensors, they could probably put a bomb in this thing. You drop it in the water in the Red Sea and three weeks later it's swimming up the Potomac.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This is good work, X, damn fine work. You need to press on at all costs, find out what they have planned with this "Ahab".
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey, one miracle at a time. They're on to me now, remember?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm gonna be en route with a team shortly to relieve you. Just keep the pressure on until the cavalry arrives. And X? You done yourself proud helping those people today.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Thanks.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're a grungy little phoenix, you know that? Keep up the good work.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You ain't seen nothing yet.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The GTO screeches into the lot. Shavers is on his way out with his SUITCASE.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Get in. We've got work to do.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: MACHINE GUNS, MINES, ROCKETS, BELTS OF AMMO

direction.raw_text: - they're all laid out on the floor. 50 cal. MACHINE GUNS, MINES, ROCKETS, BELTS OF AMMO. We finally arrive at Xander leaning on his GTO. He sparks a BLOWTORCH and lights a CIGAR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shavers looks on in shock. He's got a crew of MECHANICS with him. Xander hands him the blowtorch and walks away.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I want all that... (he pats the GTO) In there.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: This is a beautiful open air market in a town square surrounded by old buildings. The place is PACKED. In the midst of it all, we make out Petra moving through the crowd. She stops to look at some vegetables when Xander passes by her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They keep talking, pretending to shop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This stings her. She knows well the price she paid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then she's off into the crowd.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Right behind you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: So what's the plan with this Ahab? Are they selling it or what?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No, something worse. He says it's a surprise, but I know him. This is his masterpiece.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We've got to find out what it is. Can you handle that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (beat) There's something I didn't have time to tell you before.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What's that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm a agent as well. KGB. I've been undercover for over a year.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're what? What the hell have you been doing?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't know. Eight months ago I stop hearing from my people. No explanation, just silence. So I stay and I wait like I was told. Soon I'm in so far, they'd kill me if I left. Now every day I get farther and farther away from what I was. I'm like you said, a criminal.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm busted up for you, but Jesus, what the hell are you doing? Those people almost drowned on that boat and you didn't lift a finger.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No, I guess I've been no help at all to you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Get your head back in the game. There are lives at stake here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Of course. I'll do what I can. I have to go, before they notice.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: When can I see you again?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You can't, it's too risky. I'm not much help anyway, remember?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The craggy surface of the wall is swathed in shadows. Xander approaches and flattens himself against it. He's all in BLACK, packed with weapons and sporting a COMBAT VEST. He grabs a toehold on the wall and ZOOM! He SPEED CLIMBS up the side. He reaches the top in seconds and scopes out the manor house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . It's not gonna be easy. Xander slips over the wall down to the courtyard below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander places an EXPLOSIVE on a CONTROL BOX. He waits for a GUARD to stroll by and then slips through a basement window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander makes his way through a series of rooms. Finally he finds himself in a study with a window overlooking the CAVERNOUS BASEMENT of the Manor. Laid out below he can see the AHAB DEVICE, hanging from chains. TECHIES are working with the Anarchy 99 crew to RETROFIT the thing. They are installing a LAUNCHER RACK of TEN TUBES. Xander can't hear a thing through the thick glass. He takes a METAL BALL from his pocket. There's a sink in the corner and he drops the metal ball down the drain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We follow the metal ball as it rolls through the trap and down into the wall. The pipe zigzags around like a rollercoaster and then levels off. The ball rolls past a T-intersection, stops, and unrolls like a pill bug. Six metal legs appear and we see it's the ROACH CAM. It scuttles back up the pipe and makes the turn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're close on a sink as the Roach Cam comes up the pipe. It scurries into hiding just as a HAND reaches in to turn on the water. The roach peers out from between items on a workbench and we PUSH IN on it's VIDEO CAMERA head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON - VIDEO MONITOR - ROACH CAM P.O.V. We see a handheld video image of Viktor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Viktor pushes a button on Ahab and a VODKA BOTTLE launches from tube one, SHATTERING against the ceiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pull back to reveal Xander watching the image on his communicator. Using a joystick he's able to control the roach. He steers the camera towards Petra, gets a low-angle shot of her legs in a punked-out CATHOLIC SCHOOL GIRL SKIRT. He smiles, enjoying himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He plugs his earpiece in and listens in.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Okay, fire one.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Perfect!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Great piece of hardware.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Petra works on a COMPUTER CONTROLLER. The roach scurries across the floor, circling to get a better look at Ahab. Anders pushes a CART holding TEN GLASS CANISTERS OF LIQUID. Each canister is separated in two, with a BLACK LIQUID on top and a WHITE LIQUID on the bottom. He hands the canisters to Viktor one by one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Viktor laughs and joins in. Then Kirill looks down and SPOTS THE ROACH CAM. He STOMPS it with his boot.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (singing) "Silent Night... Holy Night"
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Xander jerks out his earpiece and rubs his ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He looks down into the room, sees Kirill bending down to examine the roach. Time to go.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Damn.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Kirill lifts the dead "roach" and sees its wires.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yorgi hits an ALARM switch, alerting the guards. The Anarchy boys grab weapons and start racing through the house.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: There's some bullshit going on!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Anarchy boys move swiftly from room to room in practiced close combat maneuvers. Cueing each other with hand signals, they run through each room, weapons ready.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander sprints down the hallway. With the Anarchy 99 boys and Guards roaming the house, he's having a hard time finding his way out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He runs into a darkened dining hall, sprints across only to find the opposite door locked. He hides behind one of the many COLUMNS as his pursuers enter the room. Kirill gives a thumbs up and puts on a pair of NIGHT VISION GOGGLES. He scans the big room but sees nothing. Xander, hidden at the opposite end, waits breathlessly. Kirill advances slowly, his buddies covering him from the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Across the room, Xander sees a small window leading to the courtyard. He has to run across open ground to reach it. He calls out to Yorgi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander's voice echoes around the empty hall, making it impossible to pinpoint.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He pulls out his gun as Kirill creeps ever closer. Against the far wall Xander spots a FIRE EXTINGUISHER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kirill is almost on top of him. Xander sights up and FIRES. The fire extinguisher EXPLODES, blinding Kirill. Xander makes a run for it. Everyone FIRES WILDLY (except for Petra), bullets tearing tapestries off the walls. Xander dives and crashes through the window.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Xander, my friend, that can only be you. Why don't we put our weapons down for a few minutes and discuss this like friends. How would you like to come to work for us instead? We could Rage Against the Machine together.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Speaking of people that are full of shit, funny you should mention those guys!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They put their records out through Sony, one of the biggest corporate machines on the planet. Some revolutionaries, huh?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Come on, you're the one who's fooling yourself. Why risk your life for your government when we can offer you a future that is truly free?
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: KICKING THE GUARD OFF THE WALL

direction.raw_text: Xander tuck and rolls, comes up running. Guards are running around, unsure just what the hell is going on. Xander hops on one of the TRIALS MOTORCYCLES parked nearby and fires up the engine. He hits a remote switch and BLAM! The EXPLOSIVE CHARGE he left earlier blows-up. He points the bike at a set of STONE STAIRS. They form a "ramp" that he can use to JUMP THE WALL. He GUNS THE ENGINE. A Guard races across the wall with a rifle, taking aim. Xander races and JUMPS THE BIKE over the wail. As he goes by he does a CAN-CAN AERIAL, KICKING THE GUARD OFF THE WALL before he can shoot. The Anarchy 99 guys run outside just in time to see him go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anders fires up the other trials bike, slings a submachine gun across his back and goes up and over. Petra watches him go, hoping for the best.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: He blew the gate control. Anders! Get the bastard!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: (NOTE: action will be re-choreographed based on actual locations. Any freestyle motorcycle moves will be motivated by a physical reason) Xander blazes down the street, Anders racing right behind him. A wrong turn sends him into a dead end. At the end is a panel truck parked next to a stone wall. Xander slows the trials bike and drives it up the hood of the truck and onto it's roof. Balancing on the rear wheel, he hops onto the wall. The machine gun blasts again. Xander drives off along the top of the wall. Anders shoulders his gun and follows. They are riding a 15' high wall that's only a foot wide. They make several 90 degree turns, racing above a sleeping neighborhood. Xander sees the end of the wall ahead and takes a detour. He hops onto the second floor balcony of a BUILDING UNDER CONSTRUCTION.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: bolt out of the way as the motorcycle leaps into their building. Xander pops a wheelie and slams through a BLUEPRINT TABLE. Anders follows, demolishing their SNACK TABLE. Xander darts through the building, between beams and 2 x 4's, until he reaches a skeletal STAIRCASE. More WORKERS appear at the bottom of the stairs so Xander goes up. He cranks up three flights of stairs and bashes onto the roof.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander looks around for a way out. The next building isn't that far away. He revs up and JUMPS ACROSS. Anders jams another magazine into his sub-machine gun and follows Xander. They jump from roof to roof, down a DESCENDING SERIES OF ROOFTOPS towards the river. Anders pulls up alongside as they race towards that last apartment building. Neck and neck they head for the brink. At the last jump, Xander pulls up behind Anders. They hit the last roof in a crunch of gravel. Anders clamps on the brakes and comes skidding to a stop, Xander right behind him. They skid to a stop at the very edge, with Anders balanced on his front wheel. He looks down, sees street five stories below. He glances back at Xander, sweat beading, struggling to keep his balance. Xander observes him coolly, totally in control. Anders reaches for his machine gun. Xander pops a wheelie and RAMS Anders over the edge. The bike tumbles and PANCAKES into the pavement. Anders tears through several AWNINGS before slamming into the ground. Xander turns and rides to the next apartment building. He hops down a steep series of roofs that will eventually take him to street level. As he makes his way down, Anders stirs. The guy is a bloody, broken mess but he gets to his feet. He sees where Xander is headed and he scurries off to intercept him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander is heading to the far end of a dead end alley. The only way out is fenced in. But there's a RAMP leading up to a LOADING DOCK. Xander will have to use that ramp to jump the fence. Anders climbs to the second floor of the building. There is a small crane arm loaded with metal. If he pushes it at the right time, it will swing out and knock Xander from his bike. He giggles maniacally, blood dripping. Xander drops down into the alley and heads towards the jump. Anders times it perfectly and swings the crane arm out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : The bike leaves the ramp and soars up over the fence. The crane arm swings out, on a collision course with Xander. Xander sees it and THROWS HIMSELF OFF THE BIKE, grabbing onto the back in a SUPERMAN SEAT-GRAB. He passes RIGHT UNDERNEATH the swinging crane arm. Anders's face falls when he sees Xander go by, hanging on with ONE HAND. In his OTHER HAND Xander's got his PISTOL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Xander pulls himself back onto the bike and lands. He stops, sees Anders' BLOODY HELMET come bouncing into the alley. He tucks his pistol away and roars off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander comes up the stairs and sees LIGHTS ON in his apartment. He draws his gun and pushes the door open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Slovo is sitting in the armchair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander holsters his gun, searches around for his communicator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander turns to see Slovo waving the communicator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Slovo raises his pistol.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander does so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly GUNFIRE blasts through the closed door. Bullets shatter a LAMP, a PICTURE, and finally tag Slovo in a wild salvo. Slovo crumples, never knowing what hit him. The door creaks open. It's Petra, her gun still smoking. She's with the Ivans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Ivans go to Slovo's body, kicking the gun from his hands. One of them SPITS on his corpse in disgust.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She drags him to the door.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Slovo?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Dude, what are you doing here?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You killed me, remember? Now I have to hide out here with you. Where have you been?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I found something big enough for us to take these guys down with. They've got a of nerve agent they're gonna unleash.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Is this what you're looking for?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah, give it here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sorry, "dude".
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (stunned beat) What's the deal?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh come on, don't feel bad. You got played, so what? You're new at this. Did you think you could just stroll into this business one day and have all the angles figured out?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Why you dogging me up?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (shrugs) They came and found me. They said they'd kill me unless I help them. Plus they offer me a lot of money. No big deal. These things happen. Dump your gun on the floor.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Where do you want it? The head to be quick? Or the chest for an open casket?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Are you alright?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What the hell are you doing? You could've killed me!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (shrugs) I heard you talking. I could tell where you were in the room.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't know what's going on anymore. I thought I was square with that dude. Now everybody's switching sides like it's the WWF.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What are you doing with the Ivans?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I know which cops are good and which are bad. Come with me. Come on, right now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . CHARLES BRIDGE - DAY The beautiful and historic St. Charles bridge spans the river. There are BANNERS hanging in celebration of the coming PRAGUE PEACE CONFERENCE. Petra leads Xander across it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander grabs her by shoulders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's gotten through to her. She nods in agreement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander kisses her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Together they walk back across the bridge. We crane up, revealing the PRAGUE PEACE CONFERENCE banners all over a big BUILDING on the river.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Where are we going?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're getting out of this place. We've done enough.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Wait a minute, whoa. We can't go now. What's Yorgi got planned with that nerve agent?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It doesn't matter anymore, forget it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Of course it matters. Hey, hold on!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What do we owe our governments? Yours kidnapped you, mine abandoned me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Petra, this ain't about the people that sent us here, you know that.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No, now it's about us. Let's do something for us before we both get killed. Don't you want to get to Bora Bora, Xander?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We can't leave now. We have to do something.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Why? You're the one who believes in nothing. Screw the world, or whatever you said.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Alright, so I was full of shit. I thought believing in things was wrong. Turns out believing in nothing is worse. You might as well be dead. I'm not thrilled with the world, but I'm not gonna let those idiots start killing people. Come on, you're a cop, we've got to get these guys.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They left. To a fortress in the mountains.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We'll have to go after them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Aren't you afraid?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: A long time ago I learned how to put fear away in a little place in my head. Maybe that's my problem. If you don't feel fear you can do some amazing things, but you can also screw your life up in ways you can't imagine.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I must be healthy, then, because I'm scared to death. I guess I'd better get back to Yorgi.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You don't have to do that.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes, I do. You're right. I can't just let him go free. Besides, I can help you from the inside.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Aren't they gonna wonder were you've been?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (shrugs) I was supposed to wait for the cop to kill you and then kill the cop. They'll believe me. (beat) I've been lying for so long, one more time won't hurt.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: When this is over, we're just gonna take off, the two of us. Take a vacation.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What the hell are we doing? We're doing all this together, trusting each other, making plans, and we haven't even slept together yet.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That gives us something to live for.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: We see a craggy, gnarly mountain. The front side is a rock strewn, near vertical drop. Then we see Xander come scaling up from the back side. He's got GEAR strapped to his back and it looks like it's been a helluva climb. Xander sits at the very peak and catches his breath. It's beautiful up here. He pulls a COLLAPSIBLE SNOWBOARD off his back, hits a switch and the thing SWITCHBLADES OUT to full size. He clamps it on his feet. Xander moves to the edge and peers down. At the bottom of the mountain he can see the CASTLE, an imposing medieval fortress in the snow. He leans over the edge and starts down the mountain. He doesn't get far before he notices something else. He slides to a stop on the near vertical face, clinging to rocks for balance. On the mountain below him, between him and the castle, is a GUARD OUTPOST. Right now he's in full view and he's been spotted. He sees GUARDS scrambling out, hopping on SNOWMOBILES. From up here they look like ants.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Viktor, the goateed cold weather warrior, strides out of the Outpost and looks up the mountain. He shouts orders to his men. A Guard runs up and brings him his weapon: A FLAME-THROWER. Viktor straps it on and. climbs onto his SNOWMOBILE. All around him the Guards are driving into position. They form a gauntlet of AK-47's. There must be a DOZEN of them. Viktor rides up twenty yards and waits, his engine idling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He squints up at the speck that is Xander.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Hold positions!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Xander pulls a CONCUSSION GRENADE from his jacket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He puts his goggles on and pulls the pin from the grenade. Then he TOSSES IT OVER HIS SHOULDER. The grenade lands in the snow above him and starts ROLLING DOWNHILL TOWARDS HIM. Xander pushes off and starts bombing down the mountain. The grenade bounces after him and then WHAM! It goes up with a tremendous shock. There is a SHIFT in the snow, a GROAN of shifting weight, then the ENTIRE CORNICE cracks loose and topples over the brink. Xander streaks down the mountain with that wall of snow at his heels. From down below it's an awesome sight. The slack-jawed Guards watch as tons of churning snow bear down on them. Shooting in and out of that powdery mass like a surfer, they can see Xander skipping like a stone down the mountain face. There's a mad scramble as Guards turn their snowmobiles and ride for their lives. A furious Viktor spins around and makes a run for it as well. Nobody has a chance. The avalanche is coming like a freight train, frothing like white water. Xander blazes right through the scrambling Guards and hits a JUMP. He goes soaring up and lands square on the sloped roof of the Outpost. The avalanche is right behind him, slamming down everything and everyone in its way. Guards are swallowed up and tossed, snowmobiles go tumbling under the onslaught. Xander grabs onto the chimney as the avalanche washes over the Outpost. He holds on until the ocean of snow comes to a stop. Then it's all quiet. Above him the slope is a battlefield of icy rubble. There's nothing moving up there anymore. Xander pulls himself free. Then he hears a gushing sound and a DEEP BENEATH THE SURFACE, he sees the WARM ORANGE GLOW OF FLAME. It's Viktor and his flame thrower. There's another SPURT and the glow fades for good. Xander boards to a rock and sits to catch his breath. He's right above the Castle now. Then his communicator starts to BEEP.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Nothing like fresh powder.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (into communicator) Gibbons, long time no talk. You wouldn't believe my day.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Xander looks down on the Castle. There seem to be MAFIYA HENCHMEN all over the grounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander hangs up and heads down the hill.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What the hell has been going on, Triple X? How about a status report?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Snow covered fortress. Army of bad guys. The usual.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm on the way with a team to relieve you. What's the latest?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They retrofitted Ahab with some kind of rocket launcher. They were loading canisters of liquid into it, light colored and dark colored in the same tube but separate. Something tells me this it that "classified" stuff you didn't want me to know about. Does the song "Silent Night" mean anything to you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes it does.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Come on, Gibbons, you can do better then that.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Silent Night is the name of a top secret binary nerve agent. The glass canister is shot into the air and detonated. The black and white chemicals mix, forming a toxic cloud. When it settles down to Earth, it'll kill everything in the vicinity.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Jesus Christ, Gibbons, this is something we came up with?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah, that's right. So now that you know, you understand why it's important that we get it back.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Kinda funny, though, isn't it? We're not supposed to be making weapons like that anyway. Guess we shoulda played by the rules.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Somebody else makes those decisions, not guys like you and me. You've done your job, X, head back to Prague. I'll be landing in 90 minutes. This is my operation now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We don't have that kinda time, boss, I don't think Prague's gonna be around much longer. I've gotta go now. I've got a lot of bad guys to kill.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: patrols the rocky grounds outside the castle. He stops for a smoke when Xander walks right up to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! With two quick blows he knocks him out and keeps walking. He's a man on a mission. He runs in a low crouch to the smooth castle wall. There's no hand-holds, it's, a perfectly flat climb. A canyon of ROCKS is below. Xander reaches into his jacket and pulls out the "TERMINATOR" CLIMBING CLAWS. He pulls on the metal gloves and CLAWS into the solid rock. Just like that he starts scaling the vertical surface. We see him outlined against the mountains, steadily making this impossible climb. At the top is an overhang. It's a gnarly transition. As he's rounding it, his FEET SLIP. His legs dangle over the rocky chasm below. Using all his strength, he pulls himself up the rest of the way with his climbing claws. At the top a GUARD leans over, aiming his gun at him. Xander grabs him and pulls him over the edge. The Guard FALLS into the chasm. Xander rolls onto the parapet, exhausted. Then another GUARD rushes him, grabbing for his rifle. Xander springs, the claws lashing out, and tears the gun from his hands. With the other hand he SLASHES, taking the Guard down. He pulls off the claws and heads into the Guard Tower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander exits the Guard Tower at the ground level. As he crosses the courtyard an EXPLOSION rocks the tower he just left. There is shouting as GUARDS race around the parapets, unsure where the attack is coming from. A GUARD runs up to Xander.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander CLOTHESLINES him and catches his AK-47 as he drops. Up inside the castle he can see Yorgi at a window. Yorgi appears mildly shocked as they make EYE CONTACT. Xander takes aim.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (in Russian) What's going on?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: From up above, Kirill has Xander in his sights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The bullet hits Xander's AK, sending it spinning. Xander rubs his sore hand but stays put. Kirill could have killed him and he knows it. From a doorway comes Yorgi with some Guards. Yorgi walks up and SMASHES Xander in the face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yorgi punches him again.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: That was for Anders.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't forget goatee boy. I greased him up on the diamond run.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Petra sits at a desk working on a LAPTOP. Yorgi enters with Xander and Kirill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Petra looks up. She can barely hide her shock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kirill aims his gun at Petra.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yorgi SLAPS her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Petra is devastated by this revelation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He runs this fingers through her hair and moves on to Xander.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yorgi's eye twitches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He raises his gun and suddenly BOOOOOM! A massive explosion rocks the whole castle. Shrapnel shatters the windows, spraying glass, and Yorgi's shot goes wide.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Look who we found playing outside.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Petra, my sweet dove, do you notice anything strange about X? He looks slightly less than dead.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yorgi, I thought he was --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Do you think I didn't know about you all along? My contacts in the KGB told me you were coming. You show up undercover and, I must admit, you play your part to the hilt. When it's time to be cruel, you are cruel. When it's time to be passionate, you are very very passionate indeed.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I could have killed you, but I thought this would be so much more fun. To twist you and use you how I see fit. And to be honest, you went much farther than I ever expected you would for your country.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: And you. Why do you have such a problem staying away, my friend? Did you miss us that much?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I wanted to get the hell out of Prague before Silent Night falls.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Not bad, man, not bad. You put things together quick. Prague it is.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The Peace conference...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Nice place to start, don't you think?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What's the gimmick, Yorgi? That's the part I don't get. You gonna hold the world hostage with your gas bombs? I didn't think you were dumb enough to go with that hack cliche.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You think I'm after money? I told you, my friend. Anarchy. Time for a change. Money is good, but for true freedom you have to get rid of the rules themselves.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: So all by yourself, you're going to destroy every government; in the world.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Easier than that, buddy. I'll get them to destroy each other. You kill an entire Peace conference, someone is going to have to pay. Then our friend Ahab continues down the river to the ocean and begins his world tour. London, Cairo, Beijing... Pretty soon everyone's involved. These guys bomb those guys, those guys invade these guys. Soon the whole world is like your wild West cowboy days. No rules, no law, everybody free to do what they want.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Including rape, pillage, murder.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sure, if that's what you want. Why not? It's all human nature. So we just have to launch our baby and wait for the decline and fall of civilization as we know it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: And here I thought "anarchy" was just something cool to put on a Tshirt.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Come on, Xander. You used to stand for something. What happened to you, man? I thought you'd get it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't you see, X? For the betterment of humanity, he's going to start World War Three.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He's a regular humanitarian. And all this time I thought he was just a tool.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You both could have been a part of it. You could have ridden with us into a new day, the dawning of a new age of -- XANDER Oh just shoot us already. I'm sorry I asked.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Screw you too, buddy.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: PLATOON OF CRACK CZECH SECRET POLICE

direction.raw_text: The front gates have just been blown apart. Through the smoke and wreckage come Ivans 1 & 2 with a PLATOON OF CRACK CZECH SECRET POLICE. Their submachine guns rattle in threeshot bursts, sweeping Guards from the parapets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kirill looks down at the carnage below. Xander takes advantage of the distraction and charges at Yorgi. Yorgi goes to shoot but his hand won't work. There's a HUGE SHARD OF GLASS sticking through his forearm. By the time he pulls it out, Xander is on top of him. He body checks Yorgi, sending him flying over a desk. Kirill spins and starts FIRING. Xander ducks for cover.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Czech Secret Police are having their way. They cross the courtyard and burst into the main building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Police whip through the building like lightening, mowing down everyone in their path. One Czech Secret Policeman is wounded and the others retaliate with a volley of RPG's that evaporates a pocket of resistance. In the main room upstairs, Kirill is blasting away. Yorgi starts rounding up the computer gear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Before Kirill can do so, Cops burst into the room, spraying bullets everywhere. Xander and Petra are pinned down, but Yorgi and Kirill manage to make a fast exit out another door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Cops keep shooting.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Hurry up, kill him!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey! We're on your side!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Ivan 1 is talking on the radio when Yorgi appears behind him and shoots him in the back. They step over him and enter a GARAGE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Ahab device is in the back of a flatbed TRUCK. Yorgi and Kirill start up the truck and jam it into gear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The truck smashes through the garage doors and rumbles across the courtyard. Police open fire, but the truck tears out the gate and starts heading down the mountain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Meanwhile, Xander and Petra are still pinned down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Petra starts calling out in RUSSIAN. Finally the cops stop shooting.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Petra! Tell them something!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Xander and Petra are brought outside. They see the Police working on the wounded Ivan 1. Ivan 2 walks up.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: How's Ivan?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He is okay.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Thanks for coming, man, you guys were right on time.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We are always on time. Two have escaped, in truck.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yorgi and Kirill.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Let me guess, they had a big white torpedo with them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes. Your friend, the angry one, he send something for you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: A big truck pulls to a stop. Its ramp lowers and Xander's blown-out '72 GTO comes rolling out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander and Petra both strap on grenades and pistols.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They both climb in and the GTO peels out.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We'll be right behind you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Did you do your homework?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (nods) If they launch it, I know how to bring it back.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Let's do this.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Xander drives all out, trying hard to catch up. He passes several of Ivan's Police Jeeps at a furious clip. Up ahead they see the truck winding it's way down the mountain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander floors it. Up ahead, in the flatbed truck, Yorgi drives. He can see the GTO gaining on them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kirill loads his sniper rifle and climbs out of the cab. He lays down, resting the rifle on the Ahab container. As the GTO comes into view, he sights up and FIRES, WHACK! The first shot goes clean through the windshield and blows the headrest off Xander's seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He pulls out an Mp-5 out and hangs it out the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Another shot blasts through, taking off the rear-view mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kirill laughs and takes aim once again. He puts Petra in the sights. Xander jerks the steering wheel and BLAM! the shot goes wide. The GTO veers onto a dirt road that cuts down the mountain. Xander fights for control as they slide around the turns. The road flattens out and they can see the Industrial Complex up ahead. They cut across a field, heading right for it.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Where's he headed?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He owns a big industrial complex on the river. He'll launch it from there.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (in Russian, subtitled) They're coming! Get back there.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You get down! I'll take care of this fool!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No! Don't shoot! He's hiding behind the nerve agent!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Goddamit! He's gonna stop playing around soon and shoot something valuable!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The truck heads through the gates of the industrial complex. Quickly the gates are closed again. Armed GUARDS can be seen up above. The GTO comes at the gates at full speed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander opens a DASH PANEL, revealing a ROW OF SWITCHES. He flips one. The HEADLIGHTS EJECT, revealing a MINI-GUN IN EACH FENDER.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Let's see what my man put together.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: !! The mini-guns spin. The metal doors are getting SHREDDED. Empty SHELLS spill down the sides of the GTO. The metal doors come apart, falling in chunks. The GTO slams through the wreckage without slowing down. A Guard comes tumbling down and BOUNCES off the trunk as the GTO zips inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Anarchy 99 guys seem to have a whole other army in here. Guards spill onto the road, shooting at them from everywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: EL on the GTO opens and ping-pong ball sized MINIBOMBS dump onto the road. BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! The bombs send the Guards scattering. The GTO sizzles away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A tactical (a pick-up with a .50 cal machine gun attached) pulls up behind them and opens fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Petra punches another button. The REAR HUBCAPS pop off. They roll along the road on their own. Inside they seem to be LINED WITH SPIKES. As the Tactical pulls up in between the hubcaps they BLOW UP, SPRAYING SPIKES at both sides of the Tactical. All four wheels BLOW OUT and the Tactical goes out of control. It crashes through a fence and pitches into the water, the men going sprawling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At the riverbank Yorgi and Kirill pull Ahab off the truck and prepare for launching. They remove it from it's box and carry it waist deep into the water. Yorgi opens a panel and works feverishly on Ahab's insides.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kirill grabs his sniper rifle and heads off. He climbs up to a second story window of a wooden building on a WHARF. From here he can shoot and NOT BE SEEN. He takes his LIT CIGARETTE and tucks it behind his ear. When the GTO rounds the corner he FIRES. The bullet goes through the window and SLAMS into the steering column. Xander jams it into reverse. They retreat behind a building. Petra clutches her arm, wounded.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kirill chambers another bullet and waits for them to make their second approach. The GTO comes roaring out, spinning in circles wildly. Xander's is just doing donuts as fast as he can. Kirill aims, but with all the dust being kicked up he doesn't have much of a target.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He doesn't notice Petra pop up from behind a fence with a HEAT SEEKING MISSILE LAUNCHER.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Where'd the damn truck go?!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Go to the water, it's that way!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Toadies right behind.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Let me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Fantastic options.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I've got it, go! Cover me!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You okay?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: A piece of shrapnel hit me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm sick of that guy. Let's stop playing nice.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What are you doing!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ON - the missile launcher's COMPUTER SCREEN. The green display shows a faint red glow in the upstairs window. Its the GLOWING POINT of Kirill's lit cigarette. The Launcher BEEPS as it locks in and she FIRES. Kirill looks up to see the missile blazing down the wharf at him. He gets it immediately. In a panic he fumbles for the cigarette... Too late. The missile zeroes in on his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The entire wooden shack blows apart. Xander walks up to Petra.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I guess the surgeon general was right.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ON - Ahab as Yorgi flips a switch and let's it go. The electric motor purrs to life and Ahab zips out into the river. Xander and Petra run to the water's edge in time to see Yorgi escaping in a MOTORBOAT. In the opposite direction they see the ripples of Ahab as it speeds towards it's destination. Petra finds the CONTROLLER in the cab of the truck. She presses buttons desperately.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander starts running towards a second moored MOTORBOAT.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: He's shut out the communication circuit!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You can't talk to it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No, it's like a safety. We are going to have to access the manual controls.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: A manual control on a moving torpedo. This day keeps getting better and better.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Radio Ivan! Tell him what's going down! Have them evacuate downtown!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Yorgi is motoring away, smiling, when he glances back and sees Xander and Petra take off after Ahab. He pounds on his steering wheel and turns around. His bigger boat closes on them and he reloads his weapons. Xander drives while Petra checks her controller.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're heading into downtown Prague now, the riverbank getting more and more populated. Yorgi is closing fast. Down below them Petra can see the white streak of Ahab beneath the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Petra pulls the pin on a grenade. She tosses it out in front of Ahab. WHOOMPH! A jet of water goes up, but too far behind. She pulls another pin and is ready to throw when Yorgi's boat pulls up alongside. Yorgi aims and FIRES and the bullet GRAZES Petra's arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She loses her grip and the grenade bounces down into the engine compartment. Xander grabs Petra and jumps. Together they land in Yorgi's boat. The grenade explodes and their boat slams into a bridge support and shatters. They are in the heart of the old city now. We see piazza's full of tourists, markets packed with locals, children playing in front of cathedrals. And on the river Yorgi and Xander battle it out while Petra steers the boat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander glances down, sees Ahab nearing the surface. Yorgi clobbers him and Xander falls to the edge of the boat. Petra tries to help, but Yorgi slugs her in her wounded arm. Xander can see Ahab just a few inches under as Yorgi grabs him from behind in a chokehold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander elbow's Yorgi's gut and breaks the chokehold. He flips him and they both topple overboard. They land on Ahab and both grab on. They punch and pummel each other while desperately hanging on to the speeding torpedo. It surfaces as it approaches the magnificent St. Charles bridge. On the bridge is a chaos of COPS, FIREMEN and CROWDS OF PEOPLE. They are desperately trying to herd people away from the river. Xander pounds Yorgi's face and dunks him underwater. Yorgi slips and falls back to the tail section, dragging along in the torpedo's wake. Ahab starts making noise and it's payload doors swing open. Inside Xander can see the row of glass cannister containing Silent Night. The first one rises up into FIRING POSITION.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He pries the first rocket off it's launcher. The thing is BEEPING menacingly.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: It's running three meters down. Twenty knots.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It has to surface to release the nerve agent, right?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: By then it's too late! The only way to safely dispose of the nerve agent is in deep water! The chemicals will break down and dissipate!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Use your grenades! Maybe we can blow it up underwater!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There it is! Hold it steady!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Petra!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Xander! It's coming up!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This is going to be exciting, buddy! Front row seats to the apocalypse! Come on, sing with me! (singing madly)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: am an Antichrist / I am an anarchist / I... wan-na be... Anarchy!"
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No you don't.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: - Xander blinks at the liquid death in his hands. He looks over at Petra. She's shouting at him, but he doesn't hear a thing but his own HEARTBEAT. He looks the other direction, to the mass of PEOPLE on the bridge above him. Total strangers... The fate of the whole world is in the hands of a former nihilist. Through the crowd, Xander sees Gibbons break through with his squad of Agents. Gibbons and Xander make eye contact. Then Yorgi lunges onto his back, trying to pull him into the water. Xander HITS BUTTONS on the control panel and Ahab starts to DIVE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . UNDERWATER - DAY With Yorgi hanging on his back, Xander turns the rocket upside down and stuffs it BACK IN THE LAUNCHER. Ahab heads down to the bottom of the river, the two men fighting. We see one man get THROWN FREE, the other is caught up on Ahab and continues downstream. Then the booster rocket FIRES, giving off SPARKS and BUBBLES. It's all in silhouette now as WHAM! The rocket EXPLODES, setting off a CHAIN REACTION. WHAM! WHAM! WHAM! Ahab and it's unfortunate passenger are DISINTEGRATED by the BLASTS. The chemicals BELCH OUT in harmless clouds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: blasts into the sky. The crowd recoils.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ivan 2 helps Petra off the motorboat. They look down at the water, but there's no sign of Xander. Gibbons and his men push through the cordon of POLICE, scanning the water. Nothing. Tears well in Petra's eyes. Even Gibbons looks dejected. Then Petra let's out a gasp and they look downstream. There's a boat ramp leading into the water. At first they see a ripple, then the top of a SHAVED HEAD emerges. The whole crowd looks on as Xander rises from the water, walking up the boat ramp. His shirt is tattered, his tattooed body battered. But there's a look on his face, a calm, a self-confidence we haven't seen before. The Phoenix has risen. Petra runs down to him and throws her arms around him. Xander shakes Ivan 2's hand and then turns to Gibbons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He starts walking off with Petra.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gibbons waves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Xander and Petra move off through the crowd arm in arm.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Thought you bought the farm down there, X. Glad as hell to see you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm pretty happy to see me too. So are you done with me yet?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You've kept up your end of the bargain, I'll do the same. But you really should consider staying on, you make a decent agent.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But I hate cops, remember? Except for her.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Cut the crap, X, I saw you down there. You're a hero. Don't be afraid to join the good guys.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Who says you're the good guys?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You know what they say, the only way to change the system is from the inside.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh yeah? Why don't we start by taking this thing off my ankle? The poison needles?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: On come on, X. Did you really think we were that barbaric?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No needles, huh? What about the acid bath?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: All for show. Just a psychological mind game to get you to do the right thing.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (smiles) You're a jerk-off, you know that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We'll be talking soon, you'll see. You'll be back.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I can't believe my mission is finally over. I don't even know what to do with myself.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You can't welch on me now. We had a deal.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ON - a big "X" spelled out in SEASHELLS on the sand. The camera shoots up into the sky, showing a perfect white beach, a perfect lagoon, a lush green island... BORA BORA... Then we hear the BUZZING of a TATTOO NEEDLE.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: A THIRD "X" BEING TATTOOED ON THE BACK OF XANDER'S HEAD

direction.raw_text: His ink done, Xander walks out onto the back deck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Craggy mountain peaks and perfect turquoise blue water. Xander steps out of a hut built over the water. We see Petra sprawled out on the deck in a bikini. She's got a bucket of HINANO BEER chilling down. It's a vision of heaven. He lays down next to her, starts pulling her bikini bottom off.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (laughing) What are you doing?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's about your next mission. You need to be debriefed.
dialogue.name: dialogue
